# The `X86InterleavedAccess.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the interleaved accesses optimization generating X86-specific instructions/intrinsics for interleaved access groups. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the interleaved accesses optimization generating X86-specific instructions/intrinsics for interleaved access groups.

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Out-V3 = P4, q4, r4, s4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In order to form an interleaved access group X86InterleavedAccessGroup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// requires a wide-load instruction \\p &#39;I&#39;, a group of interleaved-vectors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p Shuffs, reference to the first indices of each interleaved-vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p &#39;Ind&#39; and the interleaving stride factor \\p F. In order to generate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// X86-specific instructions/intrinsics it also requires the underlying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// target information \\p STarget.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae9baadcb34d80f6467fcd01c3f513b60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae9baadcb34d80f6467fcd01c3f513b60">X86InterleavedAccessGroup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;ShuffleVectorInst &#42;&gt;</a> Shuffs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Ind, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp;STarget,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : Inst(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), Shuffles(Shuffs), Indices(Ind), Factor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>), Subtarget(STarget),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DL(Inst-&gt;getDataLayout()), Builder(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if this interleaved access group can be lowered into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// x86-specific instructions/intrinsics, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isSupported() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Lowers this interleaved access group into X86-specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions/intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lowerIntoOptimizedSequence();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae769158e04d7d2df19b436d90e02bb85"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae769158e04d7d2df19b436d90e02bb85">X86InterleavedAccessGroup::isSupported</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;ShuffleVecTy = Shuffles&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ShuffleEltTy = ShuffleVecTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#afdce715c901d62e2c1367a0ff5248175">getElementType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShuffleElemSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(ShuffleEltTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WideInstSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently, lowering is supported for the following vectors:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stride 4:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    1 Store and load of 4-element vectors of 64 bits on AVX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    2 Store of 16/32-element vectors of 8 bits on AVX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stride 3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    1 Load of 16/32-element vectors of 8 bits on AVX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Subtarget.hasAVX() || (Factor != 4 &amp;&amp; Factor != 3))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WideInstSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(Inst-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a21b1f2d0effa0506f01cb146823de6a2">getPointerAddressSpace</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WideInstSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(Shuffles&#91;0&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/tapifile-cpp/#a913a691648e20063bbd278e8f02d8430">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We support shuffle represents stride 4 for byte type with size of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WideInstSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShuffleElemSize == 64 &amp;&amp; WideInstSize == 1024 &amp;&amp; Factor == 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShuffleElemSize == 8 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(Inst) &amp;&amp; Factor == 4 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (WideInstSize == 256 || WideInstSize == 512 || WideInstSize == 1024 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">       WideInstSize == 2048))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShuffleElemSize == 8 &amp;&amp; Factor == 3 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (WideInstSize == 384 || WideInstSize == 768 || WideInstSize == 1536))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86InterleavedAccessGroup::decompose(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;VecInst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSubVectors, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;SubVecTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;DecomposedVectors) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(VecInst) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ShuffleVectorInst&gt;</a>(VecInst)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected Load or Shuffle&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecWidth = VecInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)VecWidth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VecWidth-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(VecWidth) &gt;=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(SubVecTy) &#42; NumSubVectors &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid Inst-size!!!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SVI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ShuffleVectorInst&gt;</a>(VecInst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op0 = SVI-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1 = SVI-&gt;getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate N(= NumSubVectors) shuffles of T(= SubVecTy) type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumSubVectors; ++i)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VecLength == 768 || VecLength == 1536) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// genShuffleBland - Creates shuffle according to two vectors.This function is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only works on instructions with lane inside 256 registers. According to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the mask &#39;Mask&#39; creates a new Mask &#39;Out&#39; by the offset of the mask. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset amount depends on the two integer, &#39;LowOffset&#39; and &#39;HighOffset&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Where the &#39;LowOffset&#39; refers to the first vector and the highOffset refers to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the second vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |a0....a5,b0....b4,c0....c4|a16..a21,b16..b20,c16..c20|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |c5...c10,a5....a9,b5....b9|c21..c26,a22..a26,b21..b25|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |b10..b15,c11..c15,a10..a15|b26..b31,c27..c31,a27..a31|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the sequence to work as a mirror to the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must consider the elements order as above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this function we are combining two types of shuffles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first one is vpshufed and the second is a type of &quot;blend&quot; shuffle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By computing the shuffle on a sequence of 16 elements(one lane) and add the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct offset. We are creating a vpsuffed + blend sequence between two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shuffles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="#a49570d8463bc060cddd7b65335685002"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a49570d8463bc060cddd7b65335685002">genShuffleBland</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> Mask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Out, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowOffset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HighOffset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>() &gt;= 256 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This function doesn&#39;t accept width smaller then 256&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOfElm = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + LowOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + HighOffset + NumOfElm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reorderSubVector returns the data to is the original state. And de-facto is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the opposite of  the function concatSubVector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|      TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|  =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |1|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|      TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |2|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|3|      TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|4|  =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |2|3|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|5|      TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |4|5|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|3|6|9 |     TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|2 |3 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|4|7|10| =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |4|5|6 |7 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|5|8|11|     TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |8|9|10|11|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284" lineLink="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa">reorderSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;TransposedMatrix,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Vec, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> VPShuf,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecElems, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Stride,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VecElems == 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; Stride; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TransposedMatrix&#91;i&#93; = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(Vec&#91;i&#93;, VPShuf);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> OptimizeShuf;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmyk24 cmyk25 cmyk26 cmyk27  | cmyk28 cmyk29 cmyk30 cmyk31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT == MVT::v16i8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::copy(VecOut, VecOut + 4, TransposedMatrix.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa">reorderSubVector</a>(VT, TransposedMatrix, VecOut, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="#a76c9562101f54d25482f88ae29ed6131">Concat</a>, 16), NumOfElm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   4, Builder);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  createShuffleStride returns shuffle mask of size N.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  The shuffle pattern is as following :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#123;0, Stride%(VF/Lane), (2&#42;Stride%(VF/Lane))...(VF&#42;Stride/Lane)%(VF/Lane),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (VF/ Lane) ,(VF / Lane)+Stride%(VF/Lane),...,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (VF / Lane)+(VF&#42;Stride/Lane)%(VF/Lane)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Where Lane is the # of lanes in a register:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  VectorSize = 128 =&gt; Lane = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  VectorSize = 256 =&gt; Lane = 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  For example shuffle pattern for VF 16 register size 256 -&gt; lanes = 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#123;&lt;&#91;0|3|6|1|4|7|2|5&#93;-&#91;8|11|14|9|12|15|10|13&#93;&gt;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433" lineLink="#abf385bdb1a42f2648e94d92fbe51a9df"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#abf385bdb1a42f2648e94d92fbe51a9df">createShuffleStride</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Stride,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Mask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorSize = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LaneCount = std::max(VectorSize / 128, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lane = 0; Lane &lt; LaneCount; Lane++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, LaneSize = VF / LaneCount; i != LaneSize; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Mask.push&#95;back((i &#42; Stride) % LaneSize + LaneSize &#42; Lane);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  setGroupSize sets &#39;SizeInfo&#39; to the size(number of elements) of group</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  inside mask a shuffleMask. A mask contains exactly 3 groups, where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  each group is a monotonically increasing sequence with stride 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  For example shuffleMask &#123;0,3,6,1,4,7,2,5&#125; =&gt; &#123;3,3,2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447" lineLink="#adcbb3fbae2a0dfe66454040a45525a95"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#adcbb3fbae2a0dfe66454040a45525a95">setGroupSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;SizeInfo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorSize = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>() / std::max(VectorSize / 128, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, FirstGroupElement = 0; i &lt; 3; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GroupSize = std::ceil((VF - FirstGroupElement) / 3.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SizeInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(GroupSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FirstGroupElement = ((GroupSize)&#42;3 + FirstGroupElement) % VF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  DecodePALIGNRMask returns the shuffle mask of vpalign instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  vpalign works according to lanes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Where Lane is the # of lanes in a register:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  VectorWide = 128 =&gt; Lane = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  VectorWide = 256 =&gt; Lane = 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  For Lane = 1 shuffle pattern is: &#123;DiffToJump,...,DiffToJump+VF-1&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  For Lane = 2 shuffle pattern is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#123;DiffToJump,...,VF/2-1,VF,...,DiffToJump+VF-1&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Imm variable sets the offset amount. The result of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  function is stored inside ShuffleMask vector and it built as described in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  the begin of the description. AlignDirection is a boolean that indicates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  direction of the alignment. (false - align to the &quot;right&quot; side while true -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  align to the &quot;left&quot; side)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470" lineLink="#a0283fbbacd7e1b520ab58b9b867b1c71"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab489acbbe8913e85a72c328360e7b80b">DecodePALIGNRMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignDirection = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Unary = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLanes = std::max((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>() / 128, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLaneElts = NumElts / NumLanes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Imm = AlignDirection ? Imm : (NumLaneElts - Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = Imm &#42; (VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a2e101ce5736aa0643639fd3adae18088">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() / 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> l = 0; l != NumElts; l += NumLaneElts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != NumLaneElts; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = i + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if i+offset is out of this lane then we actually need the other source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Unary the other source is the first source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> &gt;= NumLaneElts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = Unary ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> % NumLaneElts : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> + NumElts - NumLaneElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> + l);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// concatSubVector - The function rebuilds the data to a correct expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order. An assumption(The shape of the matrix) was taken for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deinterleaved to work with lane&#39;s instructions like &#39;vpalign&#39; or &#39;vphuf&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function ensures that the data is built in correct way for the lane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. Each lane inside the vector is a 128-bit length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The &#39;InVec&#39; argument contains the data in increasing order. In InVec&#91;0&#93; You</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can find the first 128 bit data. The number of different lanes inside a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector depends on the &#39;VecElems&#39;.In general, the formula is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VecElems &#42; type / 128 The size of the array &#39;InVec&#39; depends and equal to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;VecElems&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |1|  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |2|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|3|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |2|3|  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|4|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |4|5|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|5|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VecElems = 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|2 |3 |      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|3|6|9 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |4|5|6 |7 |  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|4|7|10|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |8|9|10|11|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|5|8|11|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519" lineLink="#ad6fab051afe7926d360bac2cd1e82819"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ad6fab051afe7926d360bac2cd1e82819">concatSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&#42;Vec, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> InVec,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecElems, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VecElems == 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; 3; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Vec&#91;i&#93; = InVec&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; j &lt; VecElems / 32; j++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; 3; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Vec&#91;i + j &#42; 3&#93; = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InVec&#91;j &#42; 6 + i&#93;, InVec&#91;j &#42; 6 + i + 3&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="#a76c9562101f54d25482f88ae29ed6131">Concat</a>, 32));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// group2Shuffle reorder the shuffle stride back into continuous order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example For VF16 with Mask1 = &#123;0,3,6,9,12,15,2,5,8,11,14,1,4,7,10,13&#125; =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MaskResult = &#123;0,11,6,1,12,7,2,13,8,3,14,9,4,15,10,5&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603" lineLink="#ab6c5507fc91d0ca19adbac9927262086"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab6c5507fc91d0ca19adbac9927262086">group2Shuffle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Mask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Output) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndexGroup&#91;3&#93; = &#123;0, 0, 0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorWidth = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IndexGroup&#91;i % 3&#93;++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to generate target-sized register(/instruction).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    decompose(Inst, Factor, ShuffleTy, DecomposedVectors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform matrix-transposition in order to compute interleaved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// results by generating some sort of (optimized) target-specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              NumSubVecElems);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now replace the unoptimized-interleaved-vectors with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transposed-interleaved vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = Shuffles.size(); i &lt; e; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Shuffles&#91;i&#93;-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(TransposedVectors&#91;Indices&#91;i&#93;&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ShuffleEltTy = ShuffleTy-&gt;getElementType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSubVecElems = ShuffleTy-&gt;getNumElements() / Factor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lower the interleaved stores:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Decompose the interleaved wide shuffle into individual shuffle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  decompose(Shuffles&#91;0&#93;, Factor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ShuffleEltTy, NumSubVecElems),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">            DecomposedVectors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Transpose the interleaved-vectors into vectors of contiguous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumSubVecElems) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 4:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    transpose&#95;4x4(DecomposedVectors, TransposedVectors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 8:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    interleave8bitStride4VF8(DecomposedVectors, TransposedVectors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 16:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 32:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 64:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Factor == 4)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Factor == 3)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            NumSubVecElems);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 Concatenate the contiguous-vectors back into a wide vector.</span></CodeLine>
